Name: PEOPLEDOWN
About the game: PEOPLEDOWN is a 'Hotline Miami' style top-down stealth action game. A short experimental game. There are 5 stages in all! House, Office, Factory, Bank, Gang. Enjoy 'Hotline Miami' style gameplay on your favorite stage! In addition to the normal game mode, there is a killing mode. Wipe out and refresh your enemies with the rocket launcher!
Meta Description: Looking for information on PEOPLEDOWN? Check out the release date (Jul 20, 2021), developer insights from 3CatStudio, and a complete game summary.
